column5: Enjoy being nestled in a quiet neighborhood minutes from Grapevine lake; surrounded by wineries, upscale shopping, and a fabulous historic district. With three major theaters, several dining options, and unlimited entertainment venues you will always have something to peak your interest.  We are a 5 minute drive from DFW airport and just 18 miles from Dallas or Fort Worth.  Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
column8: Cozy Abode in Historic District (minutes from DFW)
